2. Brunei: Brunei is a small sovereign state located on the island of Borneo in Southeast Asia. It is one of the member countries of ASEAN.

3. Indonesia: Indonesia is a country located in Southeast Asia, comprising thousands of islands. It is one of the member countries of ASEAN.

6. Singapore: Singapore is a city-state and island country located in Southeast Asia. It is one of the member countries of ASEAN.

8. Vietnam: Vietnam is a country located in Southeast Asia, known for its scenic landscapes and vibrant culture. It is one of the member countries of ASEAN.
